title: We need "Powerphones" due to health reasons and to always, moment by moment be in touch til death .
content: Actually we are using turned off androids- LG K 50 i think. Need to purchase for homework, playstation games, playtrix or playtix games, job hunts, housing hunts, community ed outreach, worship plus music as therapy, medical contact and research, family and personal needs and assisting our military families. Volunteer govt use. Self-govt use. Safe neighborhood use and safer traveling use when traveling...or planning travel.
